column4: I blacklisted 8139cp and added 8139too to /etc/modules. but 8139cp still loads on boot and I still get error messege about it...
In /etc/modules? Afaik you need to blacklist it in the hotplug config
I'm not sure how exactly you blacklist something in /etc/modules, but there's a file and directory /etc/hotplug/blacklist*
Yes but how did you blacklist it?
